UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Esculentin-2CHa: a host-defense peptide with differential cytotoxicity against bacteria, erythrocytes and tumor cells.
Literature.Author: Attoub S, Mechkarska M, Sonnevend A, Radosavljevic G, Jovanovic I, Lukic ML, Conlon JM

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=>200µM),Escherichia coli ATCC 25726(MIC=>200µM),Staphylococcus aureus 127/08(MIC=>200µM),Acinetobacter baumannii NM8(MIC=>200µM),Stenotrophomonas maltophilia B32/1(MIC=>200µM),Stenotrophomonas maltophilia B32/4(MIC=200µM)
